hero.title: Your Daily Coffee Retreat
hero.subtitle: At Espresso Haven, every cup is a crafted experience. Savor the moment with us.

about.title: About Espresso Haven
about.description: Espresso Haven was founded by coffee enthusiasts to serve the perfect cup in a warm, inviting space. Our beans are roasted to perfection, and our team is passionate about every detail.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To create memorable coffee moments for everyone.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the heart of the community, one cup at a time.

products.title: Our Coffee Menu
products.subtitle: Discover our range of specialty coffees, teas, and fresh pastries, crafted for every taste.

pesticides.title: Espresso Classics
pesticides.description: Rich espresso shots, americanos, and more for true coffee lovers.

health.title: Lattes & Cappuccinos
health.description: Creamy, smooth, and topped with beautiful latte art. Choose from classic or flavored options.

fertilizers.title: Cold Brews & Iced Coffees
fertilizers.description: Chilled, refreshing, and bold. Our cold brews are steeped for hours for a smooth finish.

seeds.title: Pastries & Treats
seeds.description: Freshly baked croissants, muffins, and cakes to pair with your coffee.

irrigation.title: Teas & Alternatives
irrigation.description: A curated selection of teas, matcha, and non-coffee drinks for every guest.

whyUs.title: Why Choose Espresso Haven
whyUs.subtitle: We blend quality, comfort, and community. Every visit is a new experience.

quality.title: Quality Beans
quality.description: We source only the best beans, roasted fresh for every cup.

team.title: Expert Baristas
team.description: Our team is trained to craft the perfect drink, every time.

delivery.title: Fast & Friendly
delivery.description: Quick service with a smile, whether you dine in or take away.

testimonial.quote: Espresso Haven is my daily escape. The coffee is always perfect and the staff make you feel at home!
testimonial.author: Sarah M.

cta.title: Ready for Your Coffee Break?
cta.subtitle: Join our community of coffee lovers at Espresso Haven.

footer.ctaText: Craving coffee? Contact our baristas or order online!

hero.title: Crafting Perfect Coffee Moments
hero.subtitle: Experience the art of specialty coffee in our cozy haven where every cup tells a story of passion, quality, and community.

feature.title: Coffee Artistry
feature.subtitle: Where every cup is a masterpiece

mission.title: Our Roast Philosophy
mission.content: We source only the finest Arabica beans, roasted to perfection to bring out their unique flavor profiles. Our small-batch roasting process ensures maximum freshness and quality in every cup.

vision.title: Our Coffee Journey
vision.content: To create a welcoming space where coffee lovers can explore the world of specialty coffee, one cup at a time, while supporting sustainable farming practices and local communities.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide our coffee journey

quality.title: Premium Quality
quality.description: We're committed to serving only the highest quality coffee, carefully selected and expertly roasted to bring out the best in every bean.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: We partner with ethical farms that prioritize environmental responsibility and fair treatment of workers throughout the supply chain.

community.title: Community
community.description: Our cafÃ© is more than just a place to drink coffee â€“ it's a gathering space that brings people together and fosters meaningful connections.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We're constantly exploring new brewing methods and flavor profiles to enhance your coffee experience.

story.title: Our Story
story.content: Espresso Haven began as a dream to share our passion for exceptional coffee. What started as a small roastery has grown into a beloved community hub where coffee lovers gather to enjoy carefully crafted beverages in a warm, inviting atmosphere.

team.title: Our Baristas
team.subtitle: Passionate coffee experts dedicated to your perfect cup
team.description: Our team of certified baristas brings years of expertise and a genuine love for coffee to every drink we serve.

cta.title: Ready for Your Perfect Cup?
cta.subtitle: Join our community of coffee lovers and experience the Espresso Haven difference

ContactPage.title: Contact Us
ContactPage.description: If you have any questions or need more information, feel free to reach out to us.
ContactPage.locationDescription: Located in the heart of the city for easy access

benefits.solutions: Custom coffee solutions for your event

cta.title: Ready to Experience Great Coffee?
cta.subtitle: Contact our team today for personalized coffee solutions

form.title: Send us a message
form.description: We would love to hear from you! Please fill out the form below to get in touch with us.

form.success: Your message has been sent successfully!

PrivacyPolicyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicyPage.description: Learn how Espresso Haven collects, uses, and protects your personal information.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At Espresso Haven, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or use our services.

informationCollection.title: Information We Collect
informationCollection.content: We may collect information about you in a variety of ways. The information we may collect includes:
informationCollection.personalInfo: Personal Data: Name, email address, phone number, and other contact information you provide when contacting us or requesting our services.
informationCollection.businessInfo: Order Information: Details about your coffee orders, preferences, and feedback.
informationCollection.usageData: Usage Data: Information about how you access and use our website, including your IP address, browser type, and pages visited.

informationUse.title: How We Use Your Information
informationUse.content: We use the information we collect to:
purposes: Provide and maintain our coffee services and products
Communicate with you about our services, including responding to inquiries
Improve our website and services based on your feedback
Send you updates about new products and offers
Comply with legal obligations and regulatory requirements

informationSharing.title: Information Sharing
informationSharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this policy:
exceptions: Service providers who assist us in operating our website and conducting our business
Legal requirements when we believe disclosure is necessary to comply with applicable laws
Business transfers in connection with any merger, sale, or acquisition of our company

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

TermsOfServicePage.title: Terms of Service
TermsOfServicePage.description: Terms and conditions for using Espresso Haven's services and products.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of Espresso Haven's services and products. By accessing our website or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms.

productUse.title: Product Use and Safety
productUse.content: All users of our products must:
requirements: Follow all product labels and safety instructions
Use products only for their intended purposes
Comply with all applicable laws and regulations
Store products safely and away from children and pets
Dispose of products and containers according to local regulations
Seek professional advice when uncertain about product application

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: While we strive to provide high-quality products and services, Espresso Haven's liability is limited to the extent permitted by law. We are not responsible for damages resulting from misuse of products or failure to follow safety instructions.

warranty.title: Product Warranty
warranty.content: We stand behind the quality of our products. If you experience any issues with our products when used according to instructions, please contact us immediately. We will work to resolve any legitimate concerns.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend access to our services at any time, without prior notice, for conduct that we believe violates these Terms or is harmful to other users or our business.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may update these Terms from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the new Terms on our website. Your continued use of our services after such changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:

CookiePolicyPage.title: Cookie Policy
CookiePolicyPage.description: Information about how Espresso Haven uses cookies and similar technologies on our website.

introduction.title: What Are Cookies
introduction.content: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide information to website owners.

howWeUse.title: How We Use Cookies
purposes: Remember your language preference and settings
Analyze website traffic and user behavior
Improve website functionality and user experience
Ensure website security and prevent fraud

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They enable core functionality such as page navigation and access to secure areas.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: These cookies remember your preferences and choices to provide a more personalized experience, such as language selection.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies are used to deliver relevant advertisements and track the effectiveness of our marketing campaigns.

cookieControl.title: Managing Your Cookie Preferences
cookieControl.content: You can control and manage cookies in various ways:
options: Browser Settings: Most browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings
Opt-out: You can opt-out of certain cookies through industry opt-out mechanisms
Contact Us: Contact us if you need help managing your cookie preferences

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.content: Our website may contain links to other websites and services. These third-party sites have their own privacy policies and cookie practices, which we do not control.

updates.title: Updates to This Policy
updates.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about our use of cookies, please contact us at:
